attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, demand immediate action to make the production and use of Medical Cannabis legal for the sick and dying patients of the U.K., as a form of alternative medicine, to alleviate their pain and suffering.

This is a matter of the utmost urgency.  We propose the immediate adoption of a programme similar to the Oregon Medical Marijuana Program, which has been used as a model for other states' own medical marijuana initiatives and registration systems.

We furthermore demand a moratorium on the current laws and penalties regarding medical users and growers,  if said patient meets the requirements stated in the model programme, and chooses this alternative course of treatment.
